1116781839635615744.text:
If you’ve reached out to @unccharlotte Chancellor Phil DuBois and he has sent one of his trademarked patronizing and condescending responses, please share!  
  
Also, do not hesitate to talk down to this clearly clueless “leader” of our institution. He’s earned it.

1112190961856233472.text: Great to see success for the program that has given us @CoachSanchez49, hopefully our first taste of success like this is just around the corner! GO NINERS! #GoldStandard

1116092605606055936.text: Phil has proven just one thing in 14 years: That he will cry “uncle” quickly when Charlotte alumni organize cohesively. He is no longer necessary to this process. Today begins the end of the Phil DuBois era. #FirePhilDuBoishttps://twitter.com/StateOfCLT/status/1116091725955702784 …

1123363166874947591.text: UNC Charlotte brought me to the city where I would meet my wife, and start a family. I consider every Niner family, and it is just not fucking fair to lose family this way. I hope the loved ones of those we lost find peace, in spite of how few reasons there are to do so.

1123360746220523520.text: What a devastating day for Niner Nation, losing our own to random and evil violence.

1114141833326682114.text: Don’t know if Charlotte is contracted to play in exempt event yet, but being visiting team in 2k Classic would be great if we could host 2 sub-regional games; Road games at Duke & Georgetown would be tough environments to test new blood. Thoughts, @rmikehill & @CoachSanchez49 ???

803696871956807680.text: New post: The State of Charlotte 49er Athletics http://www.stateofcharlotte.com/the-state-of-charlotte-49er-athletics/ …

1121965731497820165.text: Titans visit the Queen Cityto play the Panthers on November 3rd.https://twitter.com/titans/status/1121964593415368706 …

1123361353949904896.text: I owe so much of my life to UNC Charlotte. My closest friends are all Niners, united by our love to see the university succeed academically and athletically.

1116010632443248645.text: Phil DuBois should just pack his bags. What an awful representative for our University.

1123391255046754306.text: Don’t take your Niner family for granted. Make yourself active on campus, make as many connections as you can, show up to as many games as you can. Among other things, today’s victims were robbed of knowing what this university could do for them. Stake your claim.

1123361950208004096.text: When an awkward, asocial kid from the coast showed up on campus, Niner athletics made making friends the easiest it had ever been for me.

1119748173675864065.text: Ole Miss big man grad transfer Dominik Olejniczak is down to Florida State and Charlotte. Told me he will visit FSU next week.

1116364341635317763.text: As a current student and nearing alumni, Phil DuBois is an embarrassment of a Chancellor. If there is anyone or anything that is holding back this university from becoming the Major player it is approaching being, it is Phil DuBois #FirePhilDuBoishttps://twitter.com/StateOfCLT/status/1116091725955702784 …
